The graph of $ x^2-4y^2=0$:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{is a hyperbola intersecting only the }x\text{ -axis} \\
\textbf{(B)}\ \text{is a hyperbola intersecting only the }y\text{ -axis} \\
\textbf{(C)}\ \text{is a hyperbola intersecting neither axis} \\
\textbf{(D)}\ \text{is a pair of straight lines} \\
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{does not exist}$
